If you want to delete your GLoan account, follow the steps below:

### **Clear balances or unpaid dues**

Ensure you’ve paid off all outstanding balances. You **can’t** delete your account if you have unpaid dues.

### **Request for GLoan deletion**

Once you've paid all your dues, [click here to ask for help](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gloan__i_want_to_delete_my_gloan_account) in deleting your GLoan account. A customer service representative will contact you in **24 hours.**
